items.summary: Ensure the landing-page hero image referenced by `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` at `/assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg` exists as a static asset in the frontend build output and loads successfully in the deployed app.
Update the hero image file content to use the newly uploaded image (`image-8.png`) while keeping the public URL path unchanged (`/assets/generated/home-hero.dim_1600x600.jpg`).
Keep the existing landing-page hero image load-error fallback behavior in `frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx` so the page layout remains stable if the hero image fails to load.
